entry.title: BIP32/43-based standard for Schnorr signatures & decentralized identity
entry.summary: Christopher Allen is a co-author of the emerging W3C Decentralized Identifier standard and of the BTCR DID method. He is also the organizer of the Bitcoin Airgapped Wallet Community and the principal architect of Blockchain Commons. As an expert in this field, he is interested in supporting discussions on this topic and implementation of any decisions made. Additionally, some patrons of Blockchain Commons may be willing to financially support reference code related to decentralized identifiers.
